name: com.castsoftware.uc.castdeliverytrigger
title: Implements a service which sends trigger when a new version is generated through DMT/AICPortal
description: This Field Extension provides a tool to activate a service for monitoring Delivery folder, in order to sense new deliveries and send trigger files to a defined location, in case of new deliveries. This is useful for automation, when an analysis must be triggered by actions done on AICPortal
